content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; contains 48 units of iron ore and is without fuel.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; fueled with 2 units of coal, has produced 6 copper plates, and is waiting for ingredients.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research with input {automation-science-pack: 10} and status NO_POWER.
- ElectricityGroup with id=13400 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) holding ~199.97 units of water at 15°C with warning “out of fuel”; has connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and is now using fluid_system [50332].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) holding ~99.85 units of water at 15°C, status WORKING; with a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) and using fluid_system [50332].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50332 at position(-6.5, 20.5) [WORKING].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50333 at position(-2.5, 20.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50334 at position(-0.5, 21.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50339 at position(-3.5, 23.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50338 at position(-7.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50343 at position(3.5, 25.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50342 at position(2.5, 24.5) [EMPTY].
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=50345 at position(-0.5, 28.5) [EMPTY].

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Issues:
  • Repeated attempts to connect boiler output to the Steam Engine left inlet using PipeGroups with fluid_system identifiers (49988, 50031, 50074, 50117, 50160, 50203, 50246, 50289) have failed.
  • Tip: Dynamically validate and retrieve active PipeGroup fluid_system identifiers to ensure a matching, working connection instead of relying on fixed values.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains without fuel, impeding effective steam generation.
  • Tip: Regularly monitor boiler fuel levels and replenish fuel to maintain proper operation.
